We provide a helper method which aims to make plotting indicators simple. For further information on the charting API please see our Charting section.

private AccumulationDistributionOscillator _adosc;

// In Initialize()
var symbol = AddEquity("SPY").Symbol;
_adosc = ADOSC(symbol, fastPeriod, slowPeriod);

// In OnData()
if (_adosc.IsReady)
{
    Plot("My Indicators", "ADOSC Current", _adosc.Current);
}
# In Initialize()
symbol = self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol
self.adosc = self.ADOSC(symbol, fastPeriod, slowPeriod)

# In OnData()
if self.adosc.IsReady:
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "ADOSC Current", self.adosc.Current);
